1. Combine the coffee and the water. Stir and allow to cool completely.

2. In a bowl, lightly whip the brewed coffee with the mascarpone cheese.

3. Crumble the biscuits.

4. Line the base and sides of a tall glass with the chocolate syrup. Add half of the crumbled biscuits.

5. Pour in the coffee and mascarpone mix and add the remaining half of the crumbled biscuits.

6. Top with whipped cream and dust with cocoa powder. Oh yes!
